channel.title: Lake Monster Culture
channel.description: Welcome to the website of a wanderjahr: my yearlong disciplined whimsy. Sponsored by the Watson Fellowship, I will be traveling to six sites around the world in search of the many nuances of lake-monster culture. Particular emphases include implications upon tourism, identity, and the changing role of mythology.
